title: Maruti Suzuki India gets revised ₹2.5 crore tax demand
description: "​Even on revised total demand of Rs. 25 million, the company will be filing appeal against the order before the Supreme Court. As per the company's view, the order will have no major impact on the financial, operation or other activities of the Company," Maruti Suzuki said in an exchange filing.
